question: Which nation celebrates the "Limassol Carnival Festival"?
explanation: Cyprus celebrates the Limassol Carnival Festival. It is annually held at Limassol city of Cyprus. It is usually celebrated on every Sunday each year before Ash Monday. It is a great revered platform for the Greek Cypriots to express their faith and optimism for a good year. It has a great social, religious and economic significance on the life of Greek Cypriots.
